The Flowers 101 Page.

The variety of flowers and plant material to choose from is endless and for some overwhelming.  First consider the following tips.

  • Tip #1:  Work with what’s in season.  It will offer you the best in quality and value.
  • Tip #2:  Be open to the possibilities.  Something may pleasantly surprise you.
  • Tip #3:  Don’t worry this is just a reference.  I’ll guide you through the process.

There is so much more than what I have listed.  Check back.  More will continue to be added.

*Simply click on the flower name to see photos and detailed information about the flower.  Click on the column headers to narrow down the selection.
